item.title: Reckless Caution Is Costing Savers
item.dc:creator: Rachael Khan
item.description: New research from The Openwork Partnership, one of the UKâ€™s largest and longest established financial advice and investment networks, shows more than 11.6 million are keeping all their money in cash despite ongoing low rates. Its nationwide study found 22% of adults prefer to keep all their money in cash while the same number will […]
